title: Document Data Extraction
description: Generalized document extraction framework forked from property appraisal extraction. Modular architecture with separate OCR and LLM pipelines for customizable document processing across various applications.
details: Extensible framework designed to be easily customized for different document types and extraction requirements. Separate OCR and LLM pipelines allow for modular integration of alternative NLP approaches.
highlights: Modular OCR and LLM pipelines for flexible document processing
FastAPI REST endpoints for programmatic access
Streamlit dashboard for interactive data review and export
Generalized architecture enabling easy customization for various document types
